website_summaries.verdict: Perfectionists may have to look elsewhere for a chandelier whose arms line up precisely. But for those looking for Art Deco styling at about half the cost of similar fixtures, this will do the job.
pros: Users were generally pleased with the look and style of this light fixture, and feel it’s good value for the price
cons: Not as precisely balanced as some would like
the globes don’t quite line up
Reports of items damaged in shipping, so check the product immediately after receiving it in case return is needed
Some found the fixture flimsy overall

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit is what you would expect for something that is $60-$70. Not bad but not great. It installed easily and looks nice with our existing fixtures. This replaced a simple builder grade single light fixture in our kitchen/dining room so the size worked perfectly for us. The arms and cups that hold the bulbs are "adjustable" and just take a little coaxing to get them level-ish. I probably spent just as much time adjusting it as I did installing it. Use an A15 low profile fan bulb in this so you don't see the bulb over the vase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Beautification at its best
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I love the look of this fixture and with the LED lamp in it, even better. Easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: 1963 Fixer Upper
customer_reviews.text: We are fixing up a 1963 home, that never moved out of that era. Bought two of these for a very long, dark hallway. Replacing two, one bulb fixtures. Price was right on, for our budget. Not a real easy install, but not the worst either. Used 60 W LED bulbs, could have used 40 W, and will change out at some point. Now a once dark hallway, is almost so bright one needs sun glasses. Would buy again, and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Grammagill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit, great price
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a unit to put over a dining table that had no light. I was very leary of purchasing it soley based on the price and for it to look nice. (Home Depot/Lowe’s were so expensive). After unit was installed I was extremely happy that I went with it, no complaints for installation (atleast I didn’t see my husband swearing at it while installing)!
customer_reviews.author: msmcc

customer_reviews.title: Especially like the marbled look of glass globes.
customer_reviews.text: The most difficult time I had in choosing any light for my dining room was imagining the correct size needed, and that was the only reason I did not give this 5 stars. It is too big for a small dining room (7' x 12'). My ceiling is a normal 8' ceiling, and I chose to use only 2 of the chains; it still looks a little low. I am happy that I asked the electrician to install a dimmer switch for it. Using the 60 watt LED bulbs is very bright on high; very nice when dimmed to your own liking.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking light
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved state to state and the current home had old ugly fixtures. I bought this for the front foyer and it looks very nice once installed. It's pretty sturdy. Please be careful when putting the bottom decorative nut after putting in the shade.....easy to drop the glass shade (our electrician did and he ended up paying for a new lamp). It's a well made lamp for the price. I bought the chandelier that goes with this and both look very nice. Use daylight bulbs in these (they are more white like natural light unlike the so called bright white that's yellowish).
customer_reviews.author: luckyrk

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not 5 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value for money and much better looking than the similar products in Home Depot or Lowe's that are a bit cheaper but not as nice looking! The installation was done by my Handy Guy and he had no problem setting it up and installing it! Would I order it again, I think not because I like a more Modern look whereas this one is Traditional but it still looks very nice but won't get my 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good deal for the price. I was going to buy another Chandelier for 200$+ when I noticed this one and decided to give it a try and I am glad I did, I wasn't looked for anything catchy so these worked out pretty well, please note that it did take a couple of hours to put it together as the instructions weren't all that clear, but I was able to find better instructions online. Overall I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AGM

customer_reviews.title: directions are horrible. and generic
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I imagined. Not the easiest install, directions are horrible. and generic. Going to be a pain in the rectum to change bulbs or clean. Very little clearance for bulbs in the lamp. The three metal extensions from the top -well, you can barely see if at all. Poor design. I have installed so many ceiling lamps but this lamp one of the worst to install.
customer_reviews.author: ME n Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: It's not worth taking back down to return
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews stated the instructions were poor. They were translated poorly and weren't detailed enough like where to put certain pieces of hardware. Luckily, we figured it out but not after about an hour of fiddling with ways to do it. The glass rests unevenly and leans more to one side. We have mostly leveled it. It's fairly close to the ceiling so you can't really see the mount while you're in the same room. I would not buy this again nor recommend to someone. It looks fine just wish it gave off the full effect of the fixture. We decided it was too much effort to take down and return back to Amazon for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great cost effective upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: While there are definitely nicer light fixtures out there this is great if you are looking to give your home a more modern look to sell or rent. For the price, no issues with quality. Installation was strait forward. I would recommend using pliers or vice grips wrapped in electrical tape to avoid marring up the chains while adjusting height. One of the glass cups came broken and called the number given on a sheet of paper and I had a new one in 3 days free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Spytek

customer_reviews.title: Love this chandelier,  great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: No serious assembly required as other reviews state, just rearrage arms to pentagon shape and then install. Add glass diffusers after installation. Not flimsy metal but feels solid and does have some heft. Especially after glass diffusers are added. There is a little bit of play allowed in the glass diffuser seating so they can all be leveled easily after install. Looks nice, light, modern, brushed nickle finish is neutral and clean in appearance. So happy to not be looking at the gold plated 60's eyesore with those flame shaped bulbs. No offense to those that are making that work. .. Price for design blows big box store offerings away like nobody's business
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go above my kitchen table after visiting the local lighting store. The price was about a third of what the store was charging for similar items, and the quality was top notch. Everything came in the box as expected and the appearance is beautiful. There is some installation skill required. Threading the electrical cord through the chain, cutting the cord and chain to length, and then installing the light into the electrical box in the ceiling (of course) are all required. If you're not sure you own the right tools to do the job you should probably plan on hiring an electrician to install for you.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Difficult to assemble.  Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the price. I would have returned it had it been $10. The instructions are terrible, the hardware cheap and soft. The bowl arrived with several hairline cracks. Spent an hour assembling it only to take it off since it was wonky and ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, Absolutely NO viable installation directions
customer_reviews.text: The product is just fine...actually pretty good quality. However, the installation instructions and pictures were a joke. In essence, there are no instructions...you are on your own. This should have been easy...take the old fixture down, put the new fixture up. NOPE!! I went to Home Depot for help, but they couldn't figure it out either. Once I figured it out, it was easy. If you are good at this stuff, you'll figure it out, too. If not, better hire an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Finn

customer_reviews.title: beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: Seriously well packed by manufacturer and amazon packed nice as well. Glass has bit of a soft swirl pattern you just cant see in online images..so very pretty.. generic wiring diagram/ instructions a bit vague for assembly required and managed without great effort..slightly larger than i though it would be but looks great in bath and plenty of light.. very happy..thank you
customer_reviews.author: shoppers critique

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit difficult to install. We needed an extra hand. It was tough to hold it up and install it at the same time. I recommend not putting in the light bulbs until it's hung up completely. I also couldn't get the lights leveled completely but you can't tell unless you look closely. It looks really nice in our entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Chandelier, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chandelier for my 'flip' house. We needed something more updated, but didn't want to spend a fortune especially since we won't be here long term. This will definitely help sell the house, as it is very nice for the price. It can be a bit tricky to install, but not too terribly difficult. A pro will have no problem. Love the alabaster look to the shades. Recommend this product if you need an upgrade...
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL DESIGN!
customer_reviews.text: The picture online doesn't do this lamp proper justice. I am so happy! It is gorgeous and really lights up the dining area of our home wonderfully. It is superb!
customer_reviews.author: ScarletRose32333

customer_reviews.title: " Classy Elegant Looking 5 Light Chandelier Really Brightens & Enhances Remodeled Small Kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to update & brighten your small kitchen for a bargain price then I highly recommend ordering this Bristol Chandelier along with five daylight fluorescent replacement lights to save money while producing maximum amount of brightness in your kitchen for cooking & mood enhancement. I just updated my previously dark small kitchen with this cheerful & expensive looking chandelier, which hangs perfectly over my cute Chelsea Corner Kitchen Nook. Note: The Chandelier glass fixtures effectively conceals the fluorescent lights. Please let me know if this review helped you by clicking yes. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Materials but..
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is made of heavy quality materials, but one of the bowls is chipped ( I don't know how to contact the seller) and be prepared for a lot of adjustment to get it to hang correctly. Each arm must be adjusted so they are equidistant from each other and then need to be twisted and bent to assure they are level. I used a small bullet level to help. Looks great once all is adjusted, but was a bit of work.
customer_reviews.author: Stevens Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lighting!
customer_reviews.text: I had a chandelier about the same size as this, except the bowls faced downward, giving an unwanted and unappealing glare to my dining table. I would actually squint when I looked up. So I checked Amazon and found this. Installed it quickly and the difference is amazing. The light now bounces off the ceiling, giving a pleasant glow to the table and inhabitants!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S. Bay

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The instructions are a joke and didn't even reflect the model I purchased, so I had to guess on how it should be put together. The glass has a design in it instead of being plain frosted like the pictures. Don't waste your money or your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: The globe is quite nice looking, but with just the base of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The curves that are evident in the picture do not show when the fixture is attached. My electrician tells me there isn't any way to make them show; they are hidden by the globe. The central portion needs to be longer so that the globe can be attached lower, to allow the curves to show. The globe is quite nice looking, but with just the base of the fixture showing the light looks like an ordinary light. If the curves were showing it would be more distinctive, which is what attracted me to it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Foster

customer_reviews.title: and it makes a great addition to my updated space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to accompany the matching pendant and semi-flush mount ceiling lights for my new kitchen. I installed this in my dining room, and it makes a great addition to my updated space. I love the amount of light it gives off. My only complaint is after installed it, I noticed once of the globes was cracked (which is not uncommon in swirled frosted globes). However, in attempting to contact the company to get a replacement globe, I was unsuccessful. I ended up having to go out and buy a new globe myself, which was not a huge expense, just more of an inconvenience that anything else. I still love the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was easily installed by my handyperson. It looks amazing and works great. FYI- This bulb fits 2 tandem light bulbs. It won't work with everyone's electrical wiring.
customer_reviews.author: tjchica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé’s mother absolutely loved this! Once we put it together I wanted one for my house!! It was hard to install for us for the hoops gave us the most problems bending them back to where they were
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Instructions VERY lacking
customer_reviews.text: Love the light. Instructions are VERY lacking. There isn't even a list that tells you what the parts are so you have to guess when putting the globe, etc. together. Still really like the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Love

customer_reviews.title: Love the clean looks of this one and how well ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in a breakfast area of the kitchen to replace a hanging fixture. Love the clean looks of this one and how well it matches the stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: Ugly in person
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this fixture for my entryway. Unfortunately, it was a mistake. Aside from there being NO directions (luckily my husbands handy) as well as it being cheaply constructed, its hideous. The metal rods on the top do not show because the bowl is so enormous. If you need to picture this, look at the picture, minus the middle rods and just have the mount and bowl, that is what it will look like. Sad that I have to return it but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: jren

customer_reviews.title: Love my new light fixture!!
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture came faster than expected and arrived undamaged. It has become a great addition to my kitchen dining area!!
customer_reviews.author: fleming_lo

customer_reviews.title: Dinning room light
customer_reviews.text: Great deal saw this and had to snatch it up. As described, arrived on time and very easy to install. Matches ceiling fan in the same room. Great finish will buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beaven

customer_reviews.title: Good value and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of brightness for dining room. Have received many compliments on it (I am renovating my house and it is the Only thing in the dining room so it is hard to miss). Definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: gqtoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearance, low quality material
customer_reviews.text: The fixture looks nice from a distance but once you get up close or touch the material you can tell the fixture is not study. Of our fixture, each of the legs had different radii which is apparent when the light is further from the ceiling. Purchased the fixture for short term use which is why it was not returned.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Built by Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Ok this fixture is very poorly designed. The hardware is flimsy and difficult to assemble as you install it on a ceiling . Seriously do designers ever try to install these things themselves before shipping them out? Pathetic execution . Would recommend you look elsewhere....
customer_reviews.author: vector59

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: just got installed today. it is a thing of beauty. purchased it with the companion hallway fixture for the front foyer. both compliment the light we had chosen for the kitchen a few years back. We are happy with the purchase; the way it was packaged and the way it was shipped
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller chandelier - perfect for a 4 person dining table. It came intact and was easy to put together and install. Not sure how to explain how it looks $50 but will try - the chain is thin, the stems holding the light bulbs are pretty thin, the bases holding lightbulbs is one piece stamped nickel? Overall, it just does not look sturdy. I thought this was an unbelievable deal but now I think I should have forked out double to get a chandlier from Home Depot or Lowes that actually looks like quality.
customer_reviews.author: ASH'S MOM

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently bought a house that needed A LOT of work. We bought this light fixture for our dining room. We cut off a few of the links to make it closer to the ceiling. It was an easy install and it looks great! Not too much, but not too simple either. It is perfect. I was afraid that it would be damaged from shipping, it arrived in perfect condition! I definitely recommend. Also, it helps that a light fixture like this could cost around 120-180 at L**** or H*** D****. I saved over half by buying this light.
customer_reviews.author: K Good

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is beautiful and worth every penny. Totally looks more than what I paid for. Yes you do have to play with it to align all the arms to look leveled but hey for $50 chandelier i can certainly do that. Big value. See my before and after pics
customer_reviews.author: Happyday

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this lamp. It works great and it wasn't hard to put up. I decided to turn the scones down for more direct lightning over my dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Martha C. Vance

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the quiet beauty of the light
customer_reviews.text: came home today to find the light installed. I absolutely love the quiet beauty of the light. Its not one that hits you in the face when you walk into the foyer. the companion chandelier for the dining room is also beautiful. I am so glad we made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The light arrived quickly and looks just like the pictures. Looks great above the dining table in the kitchen. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light fixture. For the price I got so much more then expected. Easy to install and very classy looking. Love it
customer_reviews.author: darin stevig

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This lighting fixture looks wonderful! I had this installed by a local electrician and it made such a difference to the diningroom. Impressed with the design and quality, and how much brighter and bigger it made the dining area. I was happy with the overall look of this fixture, plus it was very easy to put together out of the box. Family and friends all commented positively on how well it looked. Definitely an affordable buy for a well designed quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Semi Flush Ceiling fixture RUSTED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, one of them had rust all over one arm. Sent it back for a replacement, the replacement had rust on it also. one out of three had no rust. Still working with Amazon on a resolution. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Did not order Broken, Second Hand Product.
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture looks very nice & the "style" I was looking for. The issue is the fact that I received a 2nd had fixture that had one tier/ arm Broken & product was USED! The worse part is that I paid $140 to have it installed for a showing & the electrician told me after-the-fact that this had been opened before & broken. Box arrived dented. SorryHardware House. I was used to dump a recycled product. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Colombo

customer_reviews.title: I love the look this light fixture brought to my dining ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look this light fixture brought to my dining room. It came with a really long chain, so if you have tall ceilings, you are good. We had to trim the chain to fit our space. It is beautiful and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: pain to install, but looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love how these look now that they are installed, but man, are they a pain. They have literally 20 or more little washers and bolts that all need to go in a certain order when assembling this thing. I have 2 of them, so the first one took about 30 minutes to install, and once I got the order of the washers and bolts down, the second only took 5-10. They look elegant in my hallways and I get complimented on them. Great price! One of the screws was warped, but I fixed it myself. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. TIERNAN

customer_reviews.title: Really nice light fixture
customer_reviews.text: If there was a was a way to turn the lights facing down would have been even more perfect and matched my living room single ones.
customer_reviews.author: June Nelson Norris

customer_reviews.title: Nice chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen. I replaced a much more elaborate chandelier that was hard to keep clean and had funny colored glass with this. I love it! The clean lines and pure white glass is perfect. It’s also a very good value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Fricks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light set with very attractive glass and satin steel finish. Size was as expected. For the price, I felt this was great value for my investment property.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rampersad

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be Light!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this light. You are always taking a chance buying something sight unseen, but I'm glad I did here. This gives out more light than you can imagine. It is really pretty and the frosted globes have swirls of white that look like marble. This by no means takes away from the amount of light you get. Comes with plenty of chain. Like most people reviewing, we looked at home improvement stores with no luck. Came across this and am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lakenpath

customer_reviews.title: Loved This Chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier came to my house before I expected it too. It was in great condition and was easy to install. The only hard part was that my ceilings were so freaky high that it took two of us to do this but I imagine that any installation like this you would want two people to install the light. I can't believe what a difference this made in my entryway. I priced this in several stores and it was at least 100.00 more than what I paid for it here on Amazon I looked at products even similar. Very happy with this Chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: not pure white
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light, It was fairly easy to install and looks great. The directions are fine. In the picture the shade looks white but actually has gray streaks throughout. While it wasn't a problem for us if you want pure white be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Great Overhead Light
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with how well it looks with it being so cheap. It was perfect for our light at the top of the stairs. I used LED bulbs and it lights up the room great.
customer_reviews.author: LFGFieldTech

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Bright with the right lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and with the right light bulbs, very bright. My husband didn't like these when he first saw them. And, he thought they were a pain to install. But once he figured out how to get one installed, the second went up wit ease. After installing, he knew why I bought them...they are beautiful! Works well in our hallway!
customer_reviews.author: Menthia Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, however, it does looks nice in stair way.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I really love this light. I love the swirls, the look and everything. I’m showing the picture with the lights dimmed so you can see the swirls in the photo. If this is a look you’re going for then do it! Enough chain available for any sizing you need!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I opened the myriad of boxes within boxes as soon as it arrived at my house to see that this product had been previously opened. When I opened the smaller box with the glass shades that go over the bulbs, at least one was shattered into pieces. I stopped there to prevent from slicing my fingers on the broken glass & I am immediately boxing it back up to return as defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Great update for our dining room. Nice and bright and modern. Easy assembly and installation.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light
customer_reviews.text: My husband just installed this in our kitchen and it looks really great! The room is so much brighter, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Light up!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful! A little tricky to install, directions were not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. White

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking light for the price. Looks like and expensive light hanging. Minor problem is that arms are not level but a little tweaking you can get them close.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Builder grade at best!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product!!! I've installed several overhead lights and fan's in the past but this was one of the most difficult ones!!! Cheap product and bad information on what pieces to together... Builder grade a best!
customer_reviews.author: Lee D. Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this light fixture as the price was so low. It's beautiful! I am so glad I got this one and didn't overspend on a more expensive chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great look, good qualilty.
customer_reviews.text: Everybody seems to like it in the dining room. Good mid grade chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: EDJ

customer_reviews.title: Good way to update an old fixture for not very much
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install as long as you have an extra set of hands, or some way to support the fixture while wiring it up.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lighting for my new kitchen. So glad I got bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and was rusted!!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality!! I bought this for an investment property and when I opened it the light was rusted!!!!! And now I cant return it because its past the date. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: G. Guill

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fivture came packaged well. Was easy to install and assemble. Only dislike was the mounting bracket. Needs to be more adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi McDonald

customer_reviews.title: great product horrible install
customer_reviews.text: The Light Looks Beautiful But The Instalation Was horrible. My husband has replaced every light in our house with ease. This light took him 20 minutes to install
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Used a small carabiner instead of the supplied chain to hang it and it works great!! Combined with LED bulbs, it fits the bill above our dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Neal

customer_reviews.title: Neatly made chandelier.
customer_reviews.text: Installation instruction is shown only for the specific ceiling outlet box. So you must to prepare the appropriate method of installation. It is a pity that the electric scheme of the chandelier does not allow switching on independently two groups of lamps (3 + 2 or 4 + 1). Finished chandelier looks attractive: we hung 2 chandeliers in the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Skvira

customer_reviews.title: True to picture.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the light hangs down. I ordered two and had them installed. Look very nice in foyer and entrance.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Simple nice fixture
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for a rental unit and it gave it an updates look.
customer_reviews.author: Pixjohn

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better than the ad pictures
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install and love the milky glass
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works fine
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this fixture. What can I say, other than it looks pretty darn good for the price (and it worked). The arms are moveable and you need to swivel them out. Simple to put together. Works fine with my super old dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: It looked great and was fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my client to replace her existing chandelier before we listed her house. It looked great and was fairly easy to install! (took around 25 minutes.) Looked more expensive then it was!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn A.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this lamp for my hallway and it’s beautiful and lights very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Its classy, was simple to install, came packed well (aka no broken glass) and was a great value. I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AreYouKiddingMe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing chandelier which gives an excellent light , and the size is what i'm looking for .
customer_reviews.author: HATIM

customer_reviews.title: ... go over my kitchen/dining room table and am so glad I decided to buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many chandeliers to go over my kitchen/dining room table and am so glad I decided to buy this one. It's basic but classy which fits where my table is located.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Liimatainen Crommelin

customer_reviews.title: Looks real nice over our dinner table!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for over our dinner table. Great price for a really nice looking light. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: The alabaster shades were beautiful. I absolutely love this fixture
customer_reviews.text: This was soooo much nicer in person. The alabaster shades were beautiful. I absolutely love this fixture! The installation instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: but great light, wider than it appears in the picture
customer_reviews.text: You need to be 10 feet away to see the hardware details, but great light, wider than it appears in the picture. I put it over an island in my kitchen and have another kitchen light. We will be lowering the wattage in the bulbs, the allowed wattage is way too bright for our needs. However, it gives off a great deal of light for a kitchen if that was all you had.
customer_reviews.author: Controller

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to install.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but hard to install. The screw fittings are very shallow. There were a lot of frustrated people installing these and I had 6! It will be bad when we have to replace the bulbs...
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like on photo. It’s great for what it is. Just hard to get low voltage lights. Can be too bright
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great complimentary piece
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of several matching pieces I purchased. Was able to do a complete lighting package for a remodel. Bought 2 of these for downlighting on kitchen bar. For the money, these were a great deal. Beautiful, with reasonably good quality. Would have been impossible to find bargain fixtures like these at Lowe's or Home Depot. Seller also has a ceiling fan with a light kit that is a great match for the other pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Leith Ellis

customer_reviews.title: The product is defective.  One of the lamps has what looks like a piece of metal in it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the lamps has what looks like a piece of metal in it. I wrote to Amazon about a week and a half ago about this and since then we've been busy moving. I'm reminding the supplier that we aren't happy with the defective lamp and requested a replacement. Haven't heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We put these in both of our bedrooms in a Transitional Style home. Look great. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to assemble and install. Look good and work well. Love these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Happy grandma

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen swag light
customer_reviews.text: very nice and attractive. Love the low price. Does not look cheap.l
customer_reviews.author: topgun

customer_reviews.title: ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a small fixture and the arms seem irregular they aren’t even , get what you pay for I guess
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmommy

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap build.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I would return it but i'm too lazy to take it down. It looks nice with bright LEDs!
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, my wife is pleased. Easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier--more pieces than expected
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm ... guess I should have kept my receipt on this one. The original box was included inside a much larger box filled with plastic peanuts ... only to HIDE the broken, scratched up chandelier. Who knows if I could have put everything together, that it would actually look like the picture. My husband was very disappointed (as was I) to learn I had purchased this, only to "save" it for a rainy day project.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well packed
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and timeless. It looks perfect in my freshly redone dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Lights were just a little uneven - could have been manufactured with a little more care for balancing. Not that noticeable and still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Sask

customer_reviews.title: A very nice looking light and solid build
customer_reviews.text: A very nice looking light and solid build. Just 1 criticism, glass is too close to the light fixture and covers most of it when assembled. I purchased a 6" extension to extend the glass dome and it looks excellent now.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Blues

customer_reviews.title: Over all not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very pretty and looks good in my kitchen Cons: no instructions in English, so it was harder to assemble and install caps are rusted on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Hardware House 544452 54-4452 Bristol 5 Light Chandelier, 24"x15", Satin Nickel
product_meta.description:
Style:5-Light ChandelierBeautiful five light fixture with alabaster glass globes. This light uses five (5) 60 watt bulbs **not included**. It has a modern looking satin nickel finish. The estimated measurable size is 24"x15".

AMAZON.COM


Hardware House's Bristol five-light chandelier features an Art Deco design and is available in a satin nickel finish with alabaster glass (view larger). The Hardware House 54-4452 Bristol five-light chandelier combines the best of contemporary and classic design elements thanks to its Art Deco styling, from its graceful and refined satin nickel hardware to its alabaster glass bulb shades. Measuring 24 inches by 15 inches and intended to complement a variety of décor preferences, it’s the perfect light fixture to install in dining rooms, entryways and foyers, dens, home libraries, and more.

INTERIOR ILLUMINATION
The Art Deco-inspired Bristol five-light chandelier melds sophisticated traditional aesthetics with modern flair thanks to its clean lines, gracefully upturned alabaster glass bulb shades, and sleek satin nickel finish. Warmly emitting a soft glow through the slightly frosted glass, this light fixture contributes ambiance to any room in your home, be it a cozy dining nook or elegant front entryway. Housing five 60-watt A19 medium-base bulbs (sold separately), this beautiful chandelier offers the utmost in illumination, perfectly combining form and function.

ABOUT HARDWARE HOUSE
Hardware House has been providing thousands of excellent home décor products since 1971, when it started as a program dedicated to helping customers find the best quality and most product diversity on the market. An American-owned company, Hardware House takes pride in high standards and requires independent laboratory tests to make certain that products perform as promised. Offering a wide range of products in a variety of home décor markets—from lighting to ceiling fans to faucets to door locks to hardware—Hardware House backs every item with a manufacturer’s warranty.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One Hardware House 54-4452 Bristol five-light chandelier in satin nickel finish with alabaster glass bulb shades (five 60-watt A19 medium-base bulbs sold separately).

HIGHLIGHTS
 * Five-light chandelier in satin nickel finish and alabaster glass
 * Utilizes 60-watt A19 medium-base bulbs (not included)
 * Measures 24 inches by 15 inches
 * Backed by a limited 15-year warranty



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Enhance your decor with this beautiful 24-inch by 15-inch brushed nickel, five light chandelier. The alabaster glass in this chandelier brings a cozy warmth to any room. Five 60-watt bulbs are required. These are not included with the chandelier. This Chandelier installs like the others in the line-up. The Chandelier comes with a bracket to mount into the ceiling box(not included) and is hard wired in.It also has a trim plate that matches the light fixture to cover the ceiling box.
